Title: Relates to primary social security retirement benefits for members of the New York city fire department pension fund
Summary: Relates to primary social security retirement benefits for certain members; provides that in the computation of the normal service retirement benefit of members of the New York city fire department pension fund, there shall be no reduction for the primary social security retirement benefit.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to primary social security retirement benefits for police/fire members who are members of the New York city fire department pension fund
